docs.snippet: The Court met at 10 o'clock. The Judge announced that he had received a note from the new counsel of the prisoner, requesting a delay for a few minutes, to enable them to lave an interview with the prisoner. He would accordingly wait a short time.

headline.main: THE VIRGINIA REBELLION.; THE TRIAL OF JOHN BROWN. Close of the Testimony for the Defense. The Case to Go to the Jury to-day.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Court met at 10 o'clock. The Judge announced that he had received a note from the new counsel of the prisoner, requesting a delay for a few minutes, to enable them to lave an interview with the prisoner. He would accordingly wait a short time.

docs.snippet: Later Advices by the Northern Light--Extra Session of the Panama Legislature--A Forced Loan--American and English Cruisers Looking out for Fillibusters--A new President in Nicaragua--Interesting from Chill. The steamship Northern Light, from...
docs.lead_paragraph: Later Advices by the Northern Light--Extra Session of the Panama Legislature--A Forced Loan--American and English Cruisers Looking out for Fillibusters--A new President in Nicaragua--Interesting from Chill. The steamship Northern Light, from Aspinwall on the evening of the 20th, ult., arrived at this port yesterday. Her advices are two days later than those brought by the Baltic.
